attributes.action: Extend the current Uk curfew from 10pm to 1am.
attributes.additional_details: I think the current curfew is very unreasonable as do many others, extending this curfew by 3 hours will provide longer night but will prevent people socialising all night and morning. The 10pm curfew is very undermining to everyone and as adults we should have later freedom.
attributes.background: I and many other supporters want the current curfew to be extended to 12pm-1am.
